# 六壬辨疑

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/liuren-bianyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/liuren-bianyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install liuren-bianyi
liuren-bianyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g liuren-bianyi
liuren-bianyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
